Instruction: Season beef sirloin steak with salt and pepper.
Grill steak over high heat for 3-4 minutes per side for medium-rare. Let rest for a few minutes, then slice thinly against the grain.
Thinly slice cucumber, red bell pepper, and red onion.
Chop lettuce into bite-sized pieces and place in a large salad bowl.
Add sliced beef, cucumber, red bell pepper, red onion, cilantro, and mint leaves to the bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, fish sauce, sugar, and chopped red chili.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss until well coated.
